<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <locale xml:lang="en">
        <options>
            <option name="punctuation-in-quote" value="false"/>
        </options>
    </locale>
    <citation>
        <layout suffix=".">
            <group delimiter=", ">
                <names variable="author">
                    <name form="short"/>
                </names>
                <text variable="title" quotes="true"/>
                <date variable="issued">
                    <date-part name="year"/>
                </date>
            </group>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
